skill.name: sop-code-review
skill.description: Comprehensive code review workflow coordinating quality, security, performance, and documentation reviewers. 4-hour timeline for thorough multi-agent review.
skill.summary: Comprehensive code review workflow coordinating quality, security, performance, and documentation re...
skill.author: DNYoussef

security_audit.summary: Pure documentation skill containing only workflow instructions and prompt templates. No executable code, scripts, file system access, network calls, or command execution capabilities.

content.value_statement: Manual code reviews are time-consuming and inconsistent. This workflow coordinates multiple specialized AI agents to perform thorough reviews across quality, security, performance, architecture, and documentation in parallel.
actual_capabilities: Runs automated checks (linting, tests, coverage, build validation)
Spawns parallel specialized reviewers (quality, security, performance, architecture, docs)
Aggregates findings and categorizes by severity
Generates final review summary with approval recommendations
Notifies PR authors with actionable feedback
limitations: Requires MCP servers for agent orchestration (ruv-swarm)
Cannot directly modify code or merge pull requests
Reviews are limited to code patterns, not runtime behavior
Depends on existing test suites for coverage analysis

use_cases.title: PR code review
use_cases.description: Automate comprehensive reviews for pull requests before merge

use_cases.title: Security vulnerability scan
use_cases.description: Identify OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities and security issues in code

use_cases.title: Architecture assessment
use_cases.description: Evaluate code changes for design consistency and scalability

prompt_templates.title: Quick PR review
prompt_templates.prompt: Run sop-code-review on PR #123 in repository my-org/backend-api. Focus on security and performance.

prompt_templates.title: Security audit
prompt_templates.prompt: Execute the security review phase of sop-code-review for the authentication module. Check for OWASP vulnerabilities.

prompt_templates.title: Full integration review
prompt_templates.prompt: Run the full sop-code-review workflow on PR #456. Include integration testing and deployment impact assessment.

prompt_templates.title: Architecture review
prompt_templates.prompt: Run the architecture review phase for the microservices refactoring PR. Assess scalability and dependency patterns.

output_examples.input: Review PR #789 which adds user authentication
output: Automated checks: All passing (100% tests, 92% coverage)
Quality Review: 4/5 stars - Clean code, minor naming suggestions
Security: 2 medium issues found (input validation needed)
Architecture: Clean integration with existing auth module

best_practices: Run automated checks first to filter obviously broken PRs before manual review
Use parallel specialized reviewers to complete comprehensive review within 4 hours
Categorize findings by severity (blocking, high, medium, low) for clear action items
anti_patterns: Skipping automated checks and going straight to manual review
Reviewing only one aspect (like security) without quality or performance checks
Merging without addressing blocking issues identified in the review

faq.question: What AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: Compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Requires ruv-swarm MCP server for agent orchestration.

faq.question: How long does a full review take?
faq.answer: The complete workflow runs approximately 4 hours with automated checks in 30 minutes and specialized reviews in 2 hours.

faq.question: Can I run only specific review phases?
faq.answer: Yes, individual phases can be invoked separately. The workflow supports running security-only or performance-only reviews.

faq.question: Is my code data sent externally?
faq.answer: No code leaves your environment. All processing happens through local AI tools and MCP servers you control.

faq.question: What if automated checks fail?
faq.answer: The workflow stops and requests fixes from the PR author before proceeding with manual review phases.

faq.question: How is this different from single-agent review?
faq.answer: Multiple specialized agents review different aspects simultaneously, providing deeper coverage than a single generalist agent.
